Auckland.p: Akarana, he pa i te ao hākinakina e ngā moana rerekē, pērā i te kohī parahi kei te moana o te Moananui-a-Kiwa. Whether it's the modern vibrancy of the bustling city or the pure beauty of its natural landscapes, Akarana will captivate every visitor.

QueensTown.p: Ko Te Tāone Kuīni kei te taha o te Roto Wakatipu me ngā Maunga o te Tonga, he wāhi rongonui mō ngā mahi rongoā me ngā karapu. He wāhi rongonui mō ngā mahi rongoā, me ngā papa tākaro ki ngā taupānga hou.

MissionBay.p: Kei waho o Akarana te Whanga Mīhiona, he wāhi pātea pai mō ngā takutai, me ngā ātea kiriata. E kore koe e makona ki te ahua me te mīhiona.

FairyFall.h2: I te ropo i te au
FairyFall.p: Fairy Falls, tucked away in the native bush, offers a serene escape. This hidden gem welcomes you with peace and beautiful water landscapes.

MountainCook.p: Mount Cook, a stunning peak, offers breathtaking views of glaciers and mountain ranges, showcasing its beauty across the Southern Alps.

weather.title: Ngā Huarere o Aotearoa
weather.error: Kāore i taea te tiki raraunga huarere
